1.0.1.name: wordpress/dakno-idx
1.0.1.description:
This plugin allows you to connect your Dakno IDX solution to your blog by:

  1. Adding a quick search widget
  2. Adding a featured properties widget
  3. Allowing you to use a shortcode that will insert properties from a saved search RSS feed into your posts or pages.
